name: smart-scraper
description: A web scraper for Amazon India smart TV listings

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.postbuild: mkdir -p server/public && cp -r client/build/* server/public/ || true
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.render-postbuild: cd client && npm install --production=false && npm run build && npm run postbuild
